markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1847) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Investigator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=41)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1845)

</column>

---

You gain one [investigator feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=13/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your investigator level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you gain another investigator feat.
name: Advanced Deduction
